description:
Start your holiday shopping with Shopee 11.11 Mega Pamasko Sale! Enjoy up to 70% off on Holiday Deals, exclusive discounts on Shopee Mall, and 0% interest on all items with SPayLater! Mark your calendars because the #Shopee10Pasko celebrations start today!

Shopee is the leading online shopping platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan that offers convenient and seamless shopping to users. Buy trending items in the Philippines, and get strong payment and logistical support with secure online shopping experience and fast delivery. With this shopping app, you can easily shop online for fashion, makeup, home products, and more! 

SHOP ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
• Shop online from a wide range of categories
• Enjoy Free Shipping Araw-Araw 
• Watch Shopee Video and earn coins
• Tune in to Shopee Live and get vouchers
• Get quality products from official brands on Shopee Mall
• Score shopping deals from online shops on Shopee
• Explore Daily Discover section for tailored product offerings 
• Enjoy savings from daily Flash Deals
• Get Shopee coins cashback and vouchers
• Avail New User Exclusives

SAFE ONLINE ENVIRONMENT
• Make informed purchases - Scan through seller's ratings and reviews
• Experience secure payment - Shopee Guarantee only releases payment upon confirming receipt of order
• Enjoy strong logistics support - Track your orders from payment to delivery via up-to-date shipping information

SHOP AUTHENTIC ITEMS ON SHOPEE MALL
• Shop worry-free with guaranteed authentic products from official brands and authorized sellers

GET A CHANCE TO WIN COINS, VOUCHERS, AND MORE PRIZES
• Participate in the different games and special events to win exciting prizes daily on Shopee Philippines! 

SHOPPING APP HIGHLIGHTS
• Search by category and brand
• App-exclusive offers and daily deals notifications
• Personalized product recommendations
• Customer rating and reviews
• Order tracking
• 100% protection with Shopee Guarantee

SEAMLESS CHECKOUT & SECURE PAYMENT METHODS
• Use ShopeePay for exclusive vouchers
• Experience quick & convenient purchase process with our intuitive interface 
• Pay with your preferred method 

BUY NOW, PAY LATER 
• Use SPayLater to receive goods first and pay after a month or up to 12 months installment
• Monthly interest rates range from 1-5%, and hence annual interest rates range from 12-60%
• Processing fee ranges from 0-2% of the loan principal
• For example, if you order an item worth ₱723 at 2-month installment, you will need to pay:
         - Up front processing fee of up to ₱14.46 (assuming maximum 2% processing fee)
         - Repay principal plus interest of ₱390.06 per month (i.e. ₱780.12 across 2 months installment at a monthly interest rate of 3.95%)
         - For a total payment amount of ₱794.58

GET CASH LOANS FOR BUYERS AND SELLERS
• Use SLoan and get up to ₱100,000 in loans
• Pay in flexible installments from 3 to 12 months and enjoy exclusive vouchers once approved
• Monthly interest ranges from 1.5-5%, with annual percentage rate (APR) from 18-60%
• For example, if you withdraw ₱10,000, you will receive ₱9,900 on your ShopeePay wallet, less 1% admin fee. If you choose to pay in 3 months, you will have a monthly repayment amount of ₱3,600. This consists of ₱10,000 principal and ₱800 interest (at 3.95% monthly interest rate).

HOW WE PROTECT YOUR PRIVACY
We take our responsibilities under applicable privacy laws and regulations for all users of our platform. View our full Privacy Policy here: https://shopee.ph/m/Privacy-Policy

Monee (Credit) Finance Philippines, Inc. doing business under SPayLater & SLoans
SEC Registration No.: CS202005382 / Certificate Authority No.: 1279
Please study the Terms & Conditions before proceeding with the transaction.

Visit our WEBSITE: www.shopee.ph 
Like us on FACEBOOK: facebook.com/ShopeePH 
Follow us on INSTAGRAM : @shopee_ph 
Read our BLOG: https://shopee.ph/blog

Shopee address: 48F The Podium West Tower, 12 ADB Ave., Ortigas Centre, Mandaluyong, 1550 Metro Manila

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Smart shopping with the UNIQLO App

Functionalities:

Enjoy exclusive prices with your membership
-Join special promotions online or in the store through the app.


Check stock availability for any store
-Looking for your favorites? Search for store inventory by using the App's barcode scanner.


Get access to designs and sizes not available in store
-Shop conveniently for extra sizes, from XS to 3XL, or online exclusives.


Choose from a range of delivery options or pick up in store
-Have the items delivered directly to your home or to your preferred UNIQLO branch through the Click & Collect service.


Read products' customer ratings and reviews
-Find out what other shoppers have to say about our products' design, fit, color and more.

app_name: Atome PH - Buy Now Pay Later
description:
Atome, a leading digital consumer financing platform in Southeast Asia, now offers more than just flexible credit and installment plans. With Atome, you can:
- Shop smarter: Scan to pay with QR Ph and enjoy flexible 3 or 6-mos. installments with the Atome Card, plus 0% interest on monthly purchases.
- Access cash instantly: Atome Cash for fast, low-interest loans for your daily needs
- Grow your wealth: With Atome Savings at 3.25%* p.a. interest daily
*Rates might adjust based on Netbank’s policies and market conditions

【Atome Card】
1. Flexible payment and installment options
  - Stretch your budget and pay later at 0% interest on monthly purchases. Enjoy installment plans of up to 6 mos.
2. Easy application
  - Apply on the app in minutes. No paperwork needed.
3. Convenient for your needs
  - Shop with up to a ₱200,000 spending limit.
4. Pay later anywhere that accepts Mastercard
  - Link your physical/virtual Atome Card to shop online, like on Lazada, Shopee, and Grab.
  - Tap-to-pay in-store, even overseas.
  - Pay utilities on time at Meralco, Maynilad, Globe, Smart, or on online apps such as BillEase via GrabPay, Home Credit. and TendoPay via Bayad Center.
5. Card bills payment
  - Choose your preferred payment method: credit/debit card, InstaPay via your bank's app, like BPI, BDO, and UnionBank, e-wallets such as Maya & GCash, or over-the-counter payments.

【Atome Savings】
Atome Card users can open a savings account and earn up to 3.25%* interest p.a., daily. Enjoy 0 fees, no minimum balance to deposit, even lock-in periods, and secured deposit via PDIC insurance coverage of up to ₱1M.

【Atome Cash】
Looking for an easy, fast cash loan? Atome Cash loan offers quick approval and disbursement for up to ₱50,000. Repay loans in installments of up to 12 mos. with 1.75% interest. 
Apply on the Atome app if you are:
- A registered Atome user with past in-app transactions
- At least 18 years old with a valid ID
- With bank account, such as BPI, BDO, UnionBank, and more. 

【Download the Atome app today for a savvier lifestyle!】

ATOME CARD APPLICATION ELIGIBILITY
- Valid PH ID
- At least 18 years old 
- No minimum income requirement
- No paperwork

HOW TO APPLY FOR THE ATOME CARD
1. Download the Atome app and tap the Card tab on the home page
2. Tap "Apply for free" and choose your preferred Atome Card
3. Fill in your personal information and upload your ID
4. Get approved in 1-2 days
5. Receive your Atome Card via mail

HOW TO SHOP WITH THE ATOME CARD
1. Activate your physical card on the Atome app
2. Use virtual card to shop online
3. Use physical card to shop online and in-store

ATOME CARD INSTALLMENT PLANS:
- Monthly interest rates for as low as 1.75%
- Annual Percentage Rate (APR) ranging from 0%-36 %
- No service charges
- Installment plans are available in 3 or 6 mos.
Example total loan cost:
- Total monthly bill: ₱2,000
- Bill amount: ₱2,000
- Repayment term: 3 months
- Monthly interest rate: 2% (₱40)
- Total payment: ₱2,120 at ₱706.67/month

ATOME CASH LOAN TERMS:
- Monthly interest rates for as low as 1.75%
- Annual Percentage Rate (APR) not more than 36%
- No service charges
- Installment plans for up to 12 mos.
Example total loan cost:
- Total loan amount: ₱3,000
- Repayment term: 6 mos.
- Monthly interest rate: 1.75% (₱52.50)
- Total payment: ₱3,052.50 at ₱508.75/month

Business Name: Atome PH
Corporate Name: Neuroncredit Financing Company Inc.
SEC Registration Number: CS201816338
Certificate of Authority No.: 1178
Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas OPS Registration No.: OPSCOR-2021-0040

【Connect with us via:】
Web: https://www.atome.ph/
Card: https://www.atome.ph/atome-card
Cash: https://www.atome.ph/atome-cash
Savings: https://www.atome.ph/atome-savings
Help Center:
support@atome.ph
https://help.atome.ph/hc/en-gb/categories/4439682039065-Atome-Card
Social media:
https://web.facebook.com/atomecardph
https://www.instagram.com/atome.ph/

Lazada's "ALWAYS THE BETTER PRICE" concept will bring more happiness and satisfaction to your life with every purchase. Enjoy awesome offers everyday with free shipping!

Start shopping now and save more with mega deals and discounts!

Featured updates

AUTHENTICITY GUARANTEED 
LazMall – Lazada's flagship offering for branded products ensure genuine and authentic brands – sold by brands on Lazada through Brand Stores. 100% Authentic – directly from brands to you. Enjoy 10,000+ Global brands at your fingertips like Nike, Adidas, Maybelline, L'Oréal, and more. 

FIRST ORDER BENEFITS

Pay securely through multiple payment options: 
1. Cash on Delivery 
2. Lazada Installments

APP HIGHLIGHTS
1. App-Exclusive Notifications for Daily Offers, Deals, & Discounts 
2. Personalized Recommendations of Products, Categories, & Brands

LAZFLASH & VOUCHERS

BEST CATEGORIES

***Most Trusted Online Shopping Destination in Southeast Asia!***
Indonesia 
Marketeers 2017 – Best WOW Brand for E-Commerce 
 
Thailand 
2016-2017 Marketeer No.1 Brand Thailand – Online Shopping 

Singapore 
Asia One People's Choice Awards 2015: Top 3 E-Retailers 

Philippines 
Readers Digest Most Trusted Brand Award 2014 – Gold Standard 

Countries supported
Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, and Vietnam 

*DISCLAIMER*
Recently, we've been notified of several cases where our app is promoted fraudulently by some third-party advertisers, usually in the form of site redirection, fake vouchers, and games. These types of ads are being promoted without our consent and we strictly condemn this type of behavior. If you encounter any of these issues, please help us and copy the page URL found and report it to help@lazada.com with subject AAV so that we can put an end to this.

The Nike App is your personal guide to all things Nike. ​​Become a Member ​​​and​​ get​​ exclusive ​access ​to ​the latest from Nike and Jordan. Shop innovative sport styles, curated clothing collections, and trending trainers. Unlock ​​Member Rewards, personalised ​​style advice, and easy shipping and returns, all in one seamless shopping app.

SHOP BETTER AS A MEMBER
Shop shoes, gear, sportswear, and streetwear. Kids’, women’s, or men’s clothing– check out the latest trainers and sport essentials from Nike and Jordan.
• Member Profile: View Activity, orders, and purchase history. Buy sportswear, sneakers, and accessories with the Nike online shopping app.
• Shopping App with Member Rewards: Celebrate big moments like your birthday & Member anniversary.
• Shop Exclusive Products: Shopping is better as a Member. Unlock exclusive sportswear and trainers from Jordan. Plus, get first dibs on new, upcoming, and seasonal releases dropping weekly. Shop Jordan, Air Max Dn8, P-6000, Nike Mercurial Football Boots, Vomero 18, and more.
• Jordan Mode: Shop the latest in Jordan clothing and sneakers, plus unlock exclusive content available only in Jordan Mode. Explore basketball shoes, seasonal women’s and men’s clothing collections, and sneaker releases from Jordan.
• Nike by You: Shop and customise iconic Nike shoes with curated colour palettes and premium materials that match your style.

SERVICES THAT CONNECT & GUIDE YOU
Finding your favourite clothing and sports essentials is easier with the Nike shopping app. Be the first to score the latest sneakers when you turn on notifications. Chat one-on-one with a Nike Expert for style advice on our sneakers and clothing.
• Notifications: Never miss a sneaker drop. Jordan drops, the latest apparel, athlete collaborations, events, and more are yours to discover when you turn on push notifications.
• Training & Coaching for all: Expert advice delivered by Nike athletes, coaches, and personal trainers. Receive training tips with your Nike community from wherever you are.
• Nike Experts: Get sport and style advice from our Nike experts. Chat in real-time for guidance on all things Nike and Jordan.
• Exclusive Nike Experiences: Find Member-only events in your city and attend IRL or online. Join your Nike community.
• Shop Online with Athlete Guidance: Get exclusive access to expert advice, personalised shopping recommendations, and Member-only perks.

STORIES THAT INSPIRE & INFORM YOU
Nike is more than a shopping app. Find in-depth stories spanning across sport and culture, delivered daily. Follow your favourite athletes, sports teams, and products to get the most from the Nike App.
• Member Home: Explore new, curated Nike stories, refreshed daily.
• Clothing Trends & Trainers: Find new ways to wear your favourite Nike styles, accessories, and footwear.
• Sportswear Collections: Trainers, football boots, accessories, sportswear, or workout clothing– learn what gear empowers the top Nike athletes.

Discover a shopping app with Member benefits and explore the latest from Nike and Jordan. Unlock exclusive apparel, style recommendations, in-person experiences, and the newest sneaker releases.

Download today and experience shopping as a Nike Member.

Unlock your way to a smarter financial choice with Mocasa! With Mocasa, you can not only obtain a virtual Mastercard, but also a cash loan just in a flash.

Mocasa Quick Loan Introduction:
Loan amount: ₱3,000.00 - ₱50,000.00
Loan term: 91 days - 180 days
Maximum APR: 30%
Transaction Fee: 0
Other fees: we will charge ₱20 flat service fee for per transaction

For Example:
91-days(3 months) loan with interest rate of 12%, and principal amount is ₱10000
Total Interest fee: ₱10000*12%/365*91= ₱299.17
Service fee: 0%
Total repayment : ₱10000*12%/365*91+10000=₱10299.17
Monthly repayment: ₱10299.17/3=₱3433.06

Mocasa company is licensed by PSEC:
Corporate Name: Philippine Cashtrout Lending Corporation
Business Name: Mocasa
PSEC Registration Number: CS201910407
Certificate of Authority (CA): 3015

Note: Always study the terms and conditions and the disclosure statements before proceeding with any transaction

Loan application requirements:
• 21+ years old
• Filipino citizen
• Have 1 government-issued ID
• Have a stable income

How simple is the quick cash loan process?
• Download the Mocasa app 
• Fill out our quick loan application in the Mocasa loan lending app
• Wait for evaluation
• Get fast cash sent directly to your Bank Account/GCash/Lazada Wallet/Maya Wallet

Mocasa Advantage:
• Convenient Online App
• Instant Cash Loan
• Simple Loan Process
• Easy Approval
• Low Interest and Fees

What’s Mocasa virtual Mastercard?
Mocasa virtual Mastercard works just like a digital credit card especially issued to Mocasa users. By using Mocasa virtual Mastercard, users can enjoy the freedom of shopping whenever you want.
1. Shop whenever and wherever you want by adding your Mocasa virtual Mastercard as a payment option when you’re paying online, including but not limited to e-commerce, food delivery, car service, etc.
2. Enjoy up to 50-days interest-free billing cycle just like using a credit card. Save more with Mocasa!

How to get approved for a Mocasa virtual Mastercard?
1. Download Mocasa sign up with your phone number
2. Choose Mocasa Standard Account and fill in your info to submit your application.
3. Wait for approval. Activate your Mocasa Card after approved! Start enjoying your shopping.

More ways to use your Mocasa credit if you’re a Mocasa Standard Account or Constructive Account user!
1. Pay at over 700,000 Merchants In-store Nationwide
Shop with ease using your Mocasa credit at any QRPh-supported merchant like Jollibee, McDonald’s, AllDay Supermarket, Abenson’s, National Bookstore, Petron, SeaOil, Mercury Drug Store, and many more.

2. Pay Utility Bills, Buy Load and Data 
Get all your utility bills paid such as electricity, internet, and cable, water, buy load and data for your phone, and even do it all on credit. With Mocasa, you can pay on the spot - no more waiting for bills to arrive or going to the store to buy a load. Get the convenience you deserve and make life simpler with Mocasa!

We Want to Hear from You!
We will be fully with you 08:00 – 20:00 from Monday to Sunday and will get back to you ASAP during non-business hours.

Email Us at:
support.user@mocasa.com

For any inquiries, you can also reach to us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/MocasaPayLaterandQuickloanPH/
https://www.facebook.com/MocasaCustomerServicePH/

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

developer: Zalora South East Asia Pte Ltd
description:
ZALORA - Asia’s Online Fashion Expert
When it comes to fashion shopping online, ZALORA is your go-to style guru! We’ve got an exciting lineup of local & international brands, all handpicked for fashion lovers - just like you.

Shop Online To Enjoy More Savings, Sales, Vouchers & Other Perks
ZALORA is more than just fashionable clothes—it’s your go-to destination for all things fashion! We offer a wide selection of categories & brands, including beauty, health, electronics, kids, toys, & more. The best part? Products are 100% authentic! But wait—there’s more! Flash sales & exciting campaigns happen regularly. Stay ahead by keeping an eye on our Shopping App for big events such as Monthly sales, Payday Sale, Birthday Sales, and 10.10, 11.11 and 12.12 Mega Sales. Enjoy huge savings with cashback, vouchers, discounts, & promo codes. Our advice? Add all your must-haves to your wishlist for quick check out when sales season hits! Not sure what to grab? Get inspired by our New Arrivals and Discover sections, filled with curated picks just for you. ZALORA's TikTok, Facebook & Instagram are also great for browsing style inspos! Checkout is fairly easy, with various payment methods, including cash on delivery, for a hassle-free experience. But why stop there? Be the first to access sales, get exclusive offers & unlimited free shipping with ZALORA VIP. It will be fun! Think no more & place your first order now & snag an extra 10% off as a special welcome gift.

Safe Online Shopping with ZALORA - 100% Authenticity guaranteed by Brands - Safe transaction - Payment release upon order confirmation - Track your shopping order from payment to delivery.－Shop with confidence - 30 days free return Secure payment - Safely pay using various payment options: Buy Now, Pay Later , Cash on Delivery (COD), Credit or debit card, PayPal, GrabPay, E-Gift Card or Wallet Credit

Get The Latest Collections & Trends First On Our Shopping App Online Now:
- Clothes : Get fashionable clothing for women, men & kids ranging from dresses, t-shirts, polos, jeans
- Accessories : Online shopping for bags, watches, sunglasses
- Shoes : sneakers, heels, sandals
- Ethnic & Traditional Wear : Baju kurung, baju Melayu, and kebaya from top local brands - LÚBNA, Naelofar, NH By Nurita Harith
- Jewelleries : Wide selections of rings, necklaces, earrings from luxury brands
- Beauty : Shop makeup, skincare, fragrances for men & women
- Modest Wear : Hijab & inners for women
- Sports : Shop Nike, Adidas, New Balance

Largest Online Collection Of Fashion & Beauty Brands
- 100% authentic products only
- 500+ international & local brands to choose from
- Experience fast and easy online shopping with exclusive deals, vouchers, markdown prices, free shipping and monthly sales
- Shop for famous brands like H&M, Adidas, Nike, GAP, Mango, Fossil, Marciano, Guess, PUMA, Levi's, Next, Cotton On, Converse
- Get the latest makeup and skincare products: Laneige, Benefit, The Ordinary, SK-II, The Body Shop, Lancome, Bulgari, Montblanc, NARS, Innisfree and more
- Shop fragrances for both men and women from brands: Channel, Coach, Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Burberry and more
- Browse luxury fashion items from high-end brands: Longchamp, Michael Kors, KENZO, Karl Lagerfeld, Kate Spade, Tommy Hilfiger, Calvin Klein and more

ZALORA Online Fashion Shopping App Highlights
- Free shipping
- Convenient Shopping with Easy Product Browsing
- Push Notification For Sales, Vouchers, Offers, and Daily Deals
- Visual Search
- Personalized Product Recommendations
Customer Ratings & Reviews

SEA Awards
2016 Markie Award - Best Mobile Experience
TOP BRAND Online Apparel Gen X Winner 2014-Influential Brands
Best Choice Online Fashion Store-Best Choice Awards 2014
Contact us URL: customer@sg.zalora.com, customer@ph.zalora.com, customer@hk.zalora.com, customer@id.zalora.com, customer@my.zalora.com

WATSONS ON-THE-GO​
The No.1 health & beauty retailer in Asia is now available in the all new WATSONS APP! We’ve completely reimagined the in-app experience to make shopping fun and hassle-free. Discover our amazing deals and exclusive promotions, anywhere, 24/7 with the Watsons mobile app.​

Here’s some of the latest features you will find:​

TRY ON MAKEUP VIRTUALLY​
Now with the #ColourMe tool in our App, you can try on all sorts of makeup and color shades virtually and hassle-free! Shop for your favourite colors and styles, and try on entire “hot looks” handcrafted by our beauty experts.​

VIRTUAL MEMBER CARD​

Shop smarter and save more with ShopBack. Discover the best deals, pay easily and get rewarded with Cashback on your shopping. Withdraw your Cashback earnings effortlessly via PayPal or bank account (available in select markets only). Join over 45 million shoppers across 13 markets, including the United States, Germany,  Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Malaysia, Korea, Hong Kong, the Philippines, Indonesia, Taiwan, Thailand and Vietnam. 

Shop online and earn Cashback
Start your shopping with ShopBack, and stack your savings with online sales, coupon codes, loyalty programs , credit card miles and more at over 3,500 stores globally (number of stores will differ by country). 

**Pro-tip: Install the ShopBack Button on your Chrome web browser and shop online as usual. The ShopBack browser extension will find the best Cashback deals and discounts with just a click.**

Shop and pay with ShopBack (available in select markets only)
Boost your rewards and earn extra Cashback when you pay with ShopBack Pay at over 4,700 outlets, both offline and online (number of outlets will differ by country).

Purchase gift vouchers and earn Cashback (available in select markets only)
Earn instant Cashback when you purchase gift cards or vouchers in the ShopBack app for yourself or loved ones, and use them at your favorite online or offline stores.

Not convinced yet? Here are some of our favourite merchants:

TRAVEL: Choose from Booking.com Agoda, Expedia, Klook and more to get Cashback on your flight, hotel bookings, and anything travel-related.

FOOD: Hungry? Get delivery from foodpanda and Deliveroo, groceries from RedMart and FairPrice, or make reservations to dine out with friends and family with Eatigo and Quandoo. (Psst! You can use ShopBack Pay to pay at these places too!)

RIDES: Get the best deals on your cab rides with Grab, Ryde, and more.

FASHION & BEAUTY: Love shopping on Lululemon, Nike, ASOS, Taobao, REVOLVE and more? Get your makeup, hair, fashion and beauty fix on ShopBack!

ELECTRONICS: Want the latest iPhone? A Microsoft Surface? We’ve got you the best electronics deals at Amazon, Lazada, Shopee, Rakuten, Apple, Gearbest, Microsoft and lots more for the mobile phones, tablets, laptops, cameras and gadgets you can't live without.

---
What exactly is Cashback? Where does the money come from?

If you love shopping online, you’re probably always looking for a good deal. Cashback, coupon codes and browser extensions all help you save money, and you've come to the right place!

So, what is Cashback? When you click through ShopBack to our partners, we give you a portion of your spending back. Stores pay us commissions for sending our members to their platforms, and we share that with you in the form of Cashback. It's a win-win, and a great way to earn money while shopping online! 

The best part about getting Cashback is, of course, cashing out. Get yourself some extra money to shop more! 

How do you get Cashback?
Sign up for your free ShopBack account and browse on our app, website or browser extension to find what you love.
Click through ShopBack to be redirected to the store’s site. Shop, apply the coupon code that you’ve found on our site, and pay as you normally would. 
Cashback will be tracked in your ShopBack account and ready to be withdrawn once the store and ShopBack have verified your purchase.
Get paid via PayPal or bank account!

Tap in to our fashion feed, anytime, anywhere, and all in one spot — the H&M app. 
Get instant updates, track your orders, use your own photos to find similar items in stock, and get inspired by our users all over the world! 

Imagine yourself browsing our feed and experiencing it live all at the same time.
Sounds exciting? Keep reading!

What if you found an item in our app and wanted you to know if it’s available in any of our stores? We have the answer to that — use our FIND IN STORE feature! This feature will show you all available sizes and colours and where we currently have them in stock.

Our app also comes handy when you’re already inside one of our stores.
Let’s say you can’t find your size or would like to know if an item is available in more sizes and colours? Scan the price tag — our SCAN & FIND feature will let you know!

Seen something you like and got inspired by? VISUAL SEARCH lets you explore what we have to offer by using your own photos or screen shots. It recognizes patterns, colors, styles, and gives you a list of matching or similar items in stock.

Save the items you love the most in your own list of favourites — just tap the HEART ICON. 

Turn the H&M app into your own shopping tool — activate IN-STORE MODE when you visit one of our stores. See which of your favourite-marked items are available in the store you’re in, or nearby.

Keep up to date with the fashion world by activating PUSH NOTIFICATIONS! You’ll be the first to know when a designer collection drops and you’ll instantly be notified when we have special offers and events!

Don’t miss out — download the H&M app now!

When you download the H&M app, we will process your data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. For more details on this, please go to hm.com.

Carousell is the leading multi-category classifieds and recommerce marketplace in Singapore, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Malaysia, Philippines and Indonesia that lets you sell and buy everything including fashion, luxury, mobile phones, books, toys, cars, motorcycles, home services (renovation, cleaning, movers) and more.

We dream of a world where people instinctively sell their under-utilised items instead of letting them go to waste, and where others buy them as a first choice. Hence, Carousell was started to make buying and selling preowned items easier. 

To sell, simply take a photo to start listing on the marketplace and even start your online store. Too busy to list? You can also sell clothing, mobile phones, luxury bags and cars directly to Carousell*.

To buy, simply search for what you want. Shop secondhand mobile phones, luxury bags and cars with a peace of mind by looking for Carousell Certified listings with the ‘Certified’ tag^. Also look out for listings with the ‘Buyer Protection’ tag and ‘Buy’ button# which allows you to make purchases directly on the app via secure payment methods with escrow protection and access delivery options with popular logistics partners.

FOR SELLERS
- Snap, list, sell: Create free listings with up to 10 photos to sell your preloved or new items
- Start an online store easily with our suite of Seller Tools or run your business on Carousell with a CarouBiz subscription
- Sharing your listings easily on popular platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Telegram and Wechat for more visibility
- Become a trusted seller by earning positive reviews from buyers
- Sell clothing, mobile phones, luxury bags and cars directly to Carousell (Singapore only, and Malaysia for mobile phones and luxury bags)
- Access integrated delivery options with Carousell Official Delivery where you can drop off your orders or have them picked up from your doorstep (Singapore only) or 7-ELEVEN Cash on Delivery also available in Taiwan

FOR BUYERS
- Explore a treasure trove of unique, vintage and limited edition items
- Customise your search with keywords for fast and easy discovery
- Improve your home with available home services like aircon servicing, renovation, repairs, cleaning, movers and delivery
- Shop secondhand mobile phones, luxury bags and cars with a peace of mind with Carousell Certified (Singapore only, and Malaysia for mobile phones)
- Make purchases directly on the app with the ‘Buy’ button via secure on-platform payment methods, and enjoy Buyer Protection if your item doesn't arrive or is significantly not as described (Singapore, Malaysia and Hong Kong only)

*Available in Singapore, and Malaysia for mobile phones and luxury bags
^Available in Singapore, and Malaysia for mobile phones
#Available in Singapore, Malaysia and Hong Kong

Terms of Use: https://carousell.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360023894734
